title: Elf Defense
description: When the elven king Kelerison arrives in Godwin's Corners, Connecticut to reclaim the mortal woman who fled from him, he finds himself face to face with a formidableand unexpectedopponent: divorce lawyer Sandra Horowitz. The author of New York by Knight brings a fresh comic spirit to the fantasy genre in this upbeat story of modern suburbia's battle with the world of faerie.
author: Esther M. Friesner
